TopicTitle: Interpretting ore scanner result - where's the richest deposit?

Articles.Content:
I clicked on the cut-off + button until all the colour was removed (and then clicked the - button to go one step back). I'm guessing that leaves me with only the richest deposits showing. Is the red patch the richest or what?
